ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Peace be on Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Peace be with Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Peace be upon Moosa and Haroon!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Salam (peace!) be upon Musa and Harun!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Peace be on Musa and Haroun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Peace be upon Moses and, Aaron!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Peace be unto Moses and Aaron!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Peace be Unto Musa and Harun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Peace and salutation to Moses and Aaron!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Salamun (peace) be upon Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:120] ‘Peace, from Us, be to Moses and Aaron!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Peace be unto Moses and Aaron) bliss and safety from Us unto Moses and Aaron!
